list.name: VOODOO-CHILE
list.description: Juju's next main attack has the power of all three elements.
list.descriptionHtml: Juju's next main attack has the power of all three elements.

list.name: ELEMENTALIST
list.description: Juju gains a temporary buff based on the current environment she is standing on. Earth: Damage reduction Grass: Invisibility Water: Increased movement speed
list.descriptionHtml:
Juju gains a temporary buff based on the current environment she is standing on.
Earth: Damage reduction
Grass: Invisibility
Water: Increased movement speed
